mapper.select: select * from facility_attribute where facility_id = #{facility_id,jdbcType=TINYINT} and attr_name = #{attr_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
select facility_id, attr_name, attr_value from facility_attribute where facility_id = #{facility_id,jdbcType=INTEGER} and attr_name like 'fulfill_end_time_'

select * from facility_attribute where facility_id= #{facility_id,jdbcType=TINYINT} and attr_name in ('express_departure_time1','express_departure_time2', 'express_departure_time3', 'express_departure_time4')

select fa.attr_name,fa.attr_value from facility_district_fulfill_time fdft inner join facility_shipping_coverage fsc on fdft.facility_id = fsc.facility_id and fdft.district_id = fsc.district_id inner join facility_attribute fa on fdft.facility_id = fa.facility_id and fdft.fulfill_end_time_name = fa.attr_name where fsc.facility_id= #{facility_id,jdbcType=TINYINT} and fsc.status='OK' and fsc.express_departure_time_name = #{express_departure_time_name,jdbcType=VARCHAR} group by fa.attr_name order by fa.attr_name desc limit 1
